message: Let's split it evenly, it's a fair start!
You'll get less, I'll get more, let's see if you'll accept!
I'll give you a bit more, but not too much, let's see if you'll take it!
You're getting desperate, I'm getting greedy!
I'll give you a bit more, but I'm not going to get taken advantage of!
You're running out of time, I'm taking control!
I'm not giving up yet, let's try to find a fair deal!
You're getting close to losing everything, don't say I didn't warn you!
I'm not giving up yet, I'll try to make a last-ditch effort!
You're running out of options, it's almost all mine now!
I'll give you a little more, but I'm not going to give up yet!
It's almost over, you're going to leave with nothing!
